column4: Hi... i just came here to show off how fast linux boots on my laptop.
ill be back in a moment
i have a 19 sec boot...want to reduce it further :)
im going for a while,just be here when i come back :P
yeah i need to reduce my boot time :)
well, i didn't do anything fancy... make xconfig, unchecked some boxes and rebooted. voila... 11 seconds
when you execute make xconfig to compile a new kernel, there's a ton of stuff you can uncheck... And I optimized it for new, shiny macbook pro 64-bit
you re compiled the kernel?? no thanks
if you want to shave some seconds from your boot time, you have to compile the kernel. Did you see the results? http://img504.yfrog.com/img504/4968/toterdesktopjaunty20090.png
whats the rpm of your drive?
